title: Emerald and Polki Diamond Butta Earrings - Pachala Raallu Polki Kammalu
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds. Features a traditional Hyderabadi Polish.
features: These elegant earrings showcase a vibrant green emerald cabochon stud gracefully suspending a delicate Polki diamond floral motif. The Polki diamonds are meticulously set in an open setting that allows maximum light dispersion, accentuating their natural fire. The floral design draws inspiration from traditional South Indian motifs and provides a timeless appeal.
occasions: and traditional gatherings like Voni Function (Half-Saree ceremony). They're also versatile enough for elegant evening wear.
description: These earrings blend the regal charm of emeralds with the rustic elegance of Polki diamonds. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring a luxurious and enduring finish. The timeless design ensures these earrings remain a cherished piece for generations. Owning Polki is not only owning a precious piece of jewellery, but also owning a piece of history, craftsmanship and heritage.
